TB in England Data Clean 0.2.0

  • Vignettes
    • Use the package to construct the data
    • Estimating UK born mortality and emmigration rates
  • Functions
  • Github

Reference

Data

Data supplied with the package.

tb_interventions_timeline

Tuberculosis Interventions Timeline

tb_not_ew

Tuberculosis Notifications in England and Wales

Cleaning and munging functions

Clean and munge the various raw data sources

clean_and_munge_england_births()

A Function to Clean and Merge Observed and Projected Births in England

clean_and_munge_england_life_expectancy()

A Function to Clean and Munge Life Expectancy Estimates from England

clean_demographics_uk()

Clean and Munge UK Demographic Data

clean_labour_force_survey()

Load and Clean Labour Force Survey Data

clean_munge_ets_2016()

Clean and Munge 2016 Enhanced Tuberculosis Surviellance Data

calculate_incidence_ets_lfs_ons()

Function to Calculate Incidence Rates from ETS and Demographic Data

combine_ons_with_lfs()

A Function that Combines the ONS Demographic Data, with the LFS Demographic Data

Helper functions

Functions used to help clean and munge data.

est_inc_crude_adj()

Function to Estimate Age Adjusted Incidence

extract_case_counts()

Extract Case Counts from the ETS Data

form_df_epiR_inc_rate()

Function to Split by Country of Birth and Format for epiR

case_rate()

Function to Estimate the Case Rate for a Given Variable, stratified by given variables, dependant on age, year, agegrp2, and uk birth status. Missing data for the rate variable is dropped

Plot

Plotting functions for the included data and for the newly generated data.

plot_historic_prop_pul_tb()

Plot Historic Proportions of Pulmonary/Extra-Pulmonary TB

plot_historic_tb_ew()

Plot Historic TB Notifications in England and Wales

plot_pop_age_compare_ons_lfs()

A Function to Plot Differences Between LFS and ONS Data

Utilities

Utility functions.

save_data()

A Function to Save Results in Multiple Formats
